description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 2b. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on front flyleaf. Record follows erroneous foliation. Physical description: 20 lines per page; written in shikastah on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords; marginal and interlinear notes. Mild staining. Origin: 12 Rabīʻ II, 1180 H [17 September 1776] (leaf 127a). Incipit: الحمد لله الذي هدانا لدين الاسلام و سن لنا الشرايع والاحكام
author: Fayḍ al-Kāshī, Muḥammad ibn Murtaḍá, 1598 or 1599-1680 or 1681
abstract: First half of a treatise on Shiʻite law.
extent: 126 leaves : paper ; 212 x 155 (150 x 103) mm bound to 212 x 159 mm
provenance: On leaf 2a, two smudged owner's stamps and two notes, dated 12 Muḥarram 1255 H [28 March 1839], and Jumādá II 1339 H [February-March 1921] by Muḥammad Bāqir al-Ḥusaynī Baḥr al-ʻUlūm.
dlme_provenance_en: On leaf 2a, two smudged owner's stamps and two notes, dated 12 Muḥarram 1255 H [28 March 1839], and Jumādá II 1339 H [February-March 1921] by Muḥammad Bāqir al-Ḥusaynī Baḥr al-ʻUlūm.
